channel.title: vulnhub on XOR Grimoire

item.title: Necromancer1
item.description: Necromancer1 is a machine with an obsession for cryptic paragraphs and unorthodox ports, can we figure out how to defeat the Necromancer?` This post is a part of the vulnhub series! Locating the necromancer The first step is to determine the target machines IP address within our network. While I would typically utilize something such as nmap or netdiscover during this step, this particular machine appeared to have no open ports at first glance.
